title: german chocolate cake
directions: melt chocolate in boling water and cool
add egg yolks and beat well
add vanilla and chocolate and mix
sift dry ingredients into egg mixture, alternating with buttermilk, beating until smooth
pour into 3 wax paper lined 8" cake pans and bake at 350 for 35-40 minutes
combine 1 cup evaporated milk with 1 cup sugar, 3 egg yolks, 1/4 cup butter and 1 tsp vanilla
cook over medium heat stirring constantly until thick - about 12 minutes
remove from heat and add 1and 1/3 cups of coconut and 1 cup chopped pecans
beat until cool and of spreading consistency
